live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41184.summary: Customers in Edmonton, Leduc and surrounding communities are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41184.title: Aug 29 – Edmonton, Leduc and surrounding communities | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
